markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Giant Stag Beetle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2853)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The giant stag beetle is larger than a horse, and the sight of one flying (if slowly and somewhat clumsily) on great buzzing wings is unnerving. Its enormous mandibles are used to impress mates, intimidate rivals, and discourage predators, for they can deliver deadly blows. While giant stag beetles are deadly predators, skilled wranglers can domesticate them. In such a capacity, these beetles serve well as beasts of burden or even as mounts.

 Giant stag beetles can be a serious menace in marshes, cavern complexes, and heavy forests. More than one logging camp has attracted a cluster of giant stag beetles and had to be completely abandoned, yielding all its lumber to the hunger of the giant insects.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Animal](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=43)): DC 19

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 17

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 4">[Giant Stag Beetle](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2853)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Animal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=531" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monster Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=221) pg. 42 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Perception** +10; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=59)

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +9, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +13

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +1

**Con** +5

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** -1
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 22 

**Fort** +13 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 55

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, fly 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
mandibles +13,
**Damage** 2d8+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
foot +11,
**Damage** 1d10+5 bludgeoning

**[Trample](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=81)** <actions string="Three Actions" />  Medium or smaller, foot, DC 21.

</column>

<aside>
<title level="2" noclass="true" icon="/images/Icons/Sidebar_4_RelatedCreatures.png">Beetle Species</title>

Numerous other species of giant beetle exist in the wilds. Bombardier beetles can spew caustic acid as a potent attack, and the truly immense goliath beetles can devastate entire buildings or even castles with frightening ease.
</aside>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-371" />
name: Giant Stag Beetle
